00037 #ifndef _MM_HASH_FUN_HPP__
00038 #define _MM_HASH_FUN_HPP__

00047 using std::size_t;
00048 
00050 // Scalar integers
00052 
00058 inline size_t hash_value( char n )
00059 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }
00060 
00066 inline size_t hash_value( unsigned char n )
00067 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }
00068 
00074 inline size_t hash_value( short n )
00075 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }
00076 
00082 inline size_t hash_value( unsigned short n )
00083 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }
00084 
00090 inline size_t hash_value( int n )
00091 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }
00092 
00098 inline size_t hash_value( unsigned int n )
00099 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }
00100 
00106 inline size_t hash_value( long n )
00107 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }

00114 inline size_t hash_value( unsigned long n )
00115 { return static_cast<size_t>( n ); }

00118 // Sequences
00120 
00132 template <class Iterator>
00133 inline size_t hash_range( Iterator first, Iterator last )
00134 {
00135     size_t h = 0;
00136     for ( ; first != last; ++first )
00137         hash_combine( h, *first );
00138     
00139     return h;
00140 }
00141 
00154 template <class Iterator>
00155 inline void hash_range( size_t& seed, Iterator first, Iterator last )
00156 {
00157     for ( ; first != last; ++first )
00158         hash_combine( seed, *first );
00159 }
00160 
00166 inline size_t hash_value( char* s ) 
00167 {
00168     return hash_range( s, s + strlen( s ) );
00169 }
00170     
00176 inline size_t hash_value( const char* s ) 
00177 {
00178     return hash_range( s, s + strlen( s ) );
00179 }
00180 
00186 inline size_t hash_value( const std::string& s ) 
00187 {
00188     return hash_range( s.begin(), s.end() );
00189 }
00190 
00196 template <class T1, class T2>
00197 inline size_t hash_value( const std::pair<T1,T2>& p )
00198 {
00199     size_t seed = hash_value( p.first );
00200     hash_combine( seed, p.second );
00201     return seed;
00202 }
00203 
00205 
00206 
00215 template <class T>
00216 inline void hash_combine( size_t& seed, const T& v )
00217 {
00218     // Taken from boost::hash::hash_combine
00219     seed ^= hash_value( v ) + 0x9e3779b9 + (seed<<6) + (seed>>2);
00220 }
00221 
00223 
00237 template <class Key>
00238 struct hash
00239     : std::unary_function<Key, size_t>
00240 {
00247     size_t operator() ( const Key& key ) const
00248     {
00249         size_t h = hash_value( key );
00250         return h;
00251     }
00252     
00253 };
00254 
00255 } // namespace mm
